sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>This fix script updates the properties 'glide.ui.url.external' and 'glide.ui.url.external.content' to false for new customers.</description> <name>Disable External Link for Fresh instance</name> <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[ if(pm.isZboot()) { gs.info("Disable Connect External Link System Properties for fresh instances."); var before = gs.getSession().getWorkflow(); gs.getSession().setWorkflow(false); gs.setProperty("glide.ui.url.external", false); gs.setProperty("glide.ui.url.external.content", false); gs.getSession().setWorkflow(before); } ]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-12-22 05:51:01</sys_created_on> <sys_id>e4937d8a1be4011052a5c146604bcb9a</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Disable External Link for Fresh instance</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Connect" source="com.glide.connect">c6d370e43c31311068bcf327dfe37f18</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_e4937d8a1be4011052a5c146604bcb9a</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-12-22 05:51:01</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
